entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Native AOT CLI Experience Improvements in .NET 8 #79570
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] normal-System.Runtime.Tests/console failures on CI - `SIGKILL` during linking #79569
    8.0.0
  • mcs /dumpMap has stopped working #79568
  • WebAssembly mixed mode ahead-of-time (AOT) compilation #79567
  • Big crossgen2 perf regression in Debug mode #79561
  • Failures in checked/release asm diffs #79560
  • System.Text.Json.JsonSerializer.DeserializeAsync throws JsonException when Stream contains trailing null terminators '0x00' #79559
  • Test failure: ConvertScalarToVector128UInt32UInt32 #79558
    8.0.0
  • Crash in mono_arch_patch_callsite on Rosetta under heavy jitting #79557
  • JsonSerializer no longer passes the CancellationToken to the AsyncEnumerable #79556
    8.0.0
  • vsdbg-ui does not stop after exiting a .NET macOS application #79554
    8.0.0
  • [Mono] Enable Mono AOT compiler to print out the list of compiled methods #79551
    8.0.0
  • Last PInvoke error in LibraryImport may not be preserved after runtime internal calls #79546
    8.0.0
  • Could not load file or assembly 'System.Net.Mail, Version=6.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=cc7b13ffcd2ddd51'. The system cannot find the file specified. #79545
  • Assertion failed '((tree->gtDebugFlags & GTF_DEBUG_NODE_MORPHED) == 0) && "ERROR: Already morphed this node!"' during 'Morph - Global' #79543
    8.0.0
  • .NET 7 - Process terminated. Error while reaping child. errno = 10 #79540
  • [release/6.0][wasm] Work around an issue hit after VS upgrades #79537
    6.0.14
  • ReceiveAllAsync, ReadAllAsync and propagation of errors #79535
  • Improve formatting of System.Text.Json source generated output #79534
    Future
  • Remove Roslyn-Reflection helper abstraction from System.Text.Json source generator #79533
    Future
  • [Android] Monitor.Wait and Thread.Interrupt() returns false, not ThreadInterruptedException #79531
  • Regression in Microsoft.Extensions.Options when IOptionsMonitor<T> created concurrently #79529
  • Make ConfigurationBinder source generator functionally feature-complete #79527
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Inline access to thread statics #79521
  • Test failure JIT\\Regression\\JitBlue\\Runtime_45557\\Runtime_45557\\Runtime_45557.cmd #79518
  • Test failure JIT\\IL_Conformance\\Convert\\TestConvertFromIntegral\\TestConvertFromIntegral.cmd #79516
  • System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogRecord throws an InvalidOperationException on Windows 2022 Server with .NET 4.8 runtime #79515
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests - blazor run tests failing #79514
    8.0.0

Closed

  • HTTP/3 doesn't work with .NET 7 + Arch Linux + msquic #79520
  • Pointless codegen for '>=' and '<' comparisons of values with UInt32 / UInt64 underlying types to 0 #11349
    Future
  • Analyzer suggestion: Avoid unnecessary enum boxing #79548
  • Prolog code don't initialize all 16 bytes of struct in multi-reg scenario #34359
    Future
  • AutoMapper crashes on .NET 6 iOS MAUI application mapping IEnumerable properties #79354
    7.0.x
  • Test failure JIT\\opt\\Tailcall\\TailcallVerifyWithPrefix\\TailcallVerifyWithPrefix.cmd #79517
  • CookieContainer doesnt work #79055
  • An empty .NET 7.0 app allocates huge amount of memory (579 MB / 4 GB) on Windows 7 64 bit . #79469
  • System.Text.Json.Tests.Utf8JsonWriterTests.WriteNumbers test failing in CI #79404
  • Strange codegen with struct forwarding implementation to another struct #11000
    Future
  • Inlined struct copies via params, returns and assignment not elided #12219
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add JsonSerializer overloads accepting non-generic JsonTypeInfo #77051
    8.0.0
  • Fail to get_free_region in thread_final_regions due to low memory for mark array might lead to AV. #74401
    8.0.0
  • Generic virtual method devirtualization does not happen #32129
    Future
  • JIT: Bounds checks not removed after casting a Span<T> with a known length to another type #32776
    Future
  • Inefficient codegen when trying to abstract endianness differences with StructLayout.Explicit. #36592
    Future
  • [MONO][Interp] Assertion at /__w/1/s/src/mono/mono/mini/interp/transform.c:4527, condition `td->sp >= td->stack' not met on Android x64 with interpreter #54395
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 4 Regressions on 11/23/2022 5:21:28 AM #78980
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 25 Regressions on 11/2/2022 4:25:40 PM #78812
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 4 Regressions on 11/2/2022 9:17:08 PM #78814
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 70 Regressions on 11/2/2022 4:25:40 PM #78813
    8.0.0
  • DynamicDependency to property doesn't work with NativeAOT #75994
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 1 Regression on 10/13/2022 10:51:15 PM #78809
  • Test failure JIT/Methodical/Arrays/lcs/lcs2_r/lcs2_r.cmd #69092
    8.0.0
  • HTTP requests made by app extremely slow #79405
  • [net6.0-ios+] Referenced project gets mistaken for an Apple framework when `GenerateDocumentationFile` is set to true #79500
  • Microsoft.SourceBuild.Intermediate.runtime.linux-x64 package from CI is missing library packages #78054
  • NativeAOT on Alpine with StaticICULinking #79498

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: Allow sharing call temps within statements #79574
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Let browser-bench post bootstrap flag #79573
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/6.0][wasm] Partially fix issue caused during VS upgrade #79572
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 6.0.14
  • Fix mcs -dumpMap #79571
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add few Span and String measurements #79566
  • Don't require singlefilehost in host.native #79565
    area-Host
  • [mono][interp] Fix some issues that are hit in tests when we tier up methods immediately #79564
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fix a few profiler related issues associated with frozen objects #79563
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix JsonSerializer.SerializeAsync not passing the cancellation token to converters #79562
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [workloads] Specify arm64 alias instead of arm in the arm64 pack #79555
    area-Build-mono
  • Dynamic generate hwintrinsic tests #79552
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Emit mneg for mul+neg on Arm64 #79550
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fix compression #79549
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/7.0] Fix compression #79547
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Enable AVX512 Additional 16 SIMD Registers #79544
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [release/7.0][wasm][debugger] Improvements in debugging in async methods #79542
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix ordering of checks in AppendInterpolatedStringHandler.AppendFormatted #79539
    area-System.Runtime
  • [wasm] Disable running blazor template projects #79536
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Handle Assert failure when GetDelegateForFunctionPointer is invoked with VoidDelegate type #79530
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use ArrayBuffer for write buffer management in HttpConnection #79525
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Use ArrayBuffer for read buffer management in HttpConnection #79524
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Fix up NativeAOT testing #79523
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update to 8.0 SDK #79522
  • [NativeAOT] Thin locks #79519
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • [wasm] Enable System.Numerics vectors SIMD #78068
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Add missing case to relational with constant optimization #79541
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Objective-C Marshal: object tracker support #78280
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Add unbox when calling valuetype method through delegate #79445
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fix compression #79412
    area-System.Net
  • Add explicit tail. prefix to a tailcall test #79532
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • RhpGetTickCount64: set the return type to match the definition in InternalCalls.cs #79538
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add weakly typed Serialize and Deserialize overloads accepting JsonTypeInfo. #79397
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Remove hard_limit_for_bookkeeping #77480
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Mark DnsGetHostAddresses_PostCancelledToken_Throws as outerloop #79528
    area-System.Net
  • [wasm] reduce MethodImplOptions.NoInlining #79457
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Disable failing blazor tests #79526
    arch-wasm, disabled-test, area-Build-mono
  • Split library and package Readme #78888
    area-Meta, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Throw invalid program if stack state is invalid #73215
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fixes remaining issues with DynamicDependency attribute and adds tests #79398
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete unused FreeLibraryAndExitThread from PAL #79452
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Fix GC stress C on macOS arm64 #79426
    area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • add --allconfigurations for portable source-build #79400
    source-build
  • Link static libstdc++ with libicuc in NativeAOT #79501
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Enable smoke tests on macOS #76560
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Use non-generic Array.Sort in EnumInfo on nativeaot #79473
  • Respect SETTINGS_MAX_HEADER_LIST_SIZE on HTTP/2 and HTTP/3 #79281
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • [IGNORE][wasi][wasm] Testing wasi build #79388
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Implement DynamicMethod.RTDynamicMethod.CreateDelegate. #79427
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • [draft][wasi] compile with libs.native #79046
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • ifdef out unsupported Enum underlying types for nativeaot #79472
  • [wasm][debugger] Implement support to symbolOptions from dap. #79284
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Preparation for JIT\Regression test merging - assembly/file renames #79489
    test-enhancement, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • This fixes emitGetVexPrefixSize to support detecting 2-byte prefix support #79478
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Merge-on-Red] - Implement Test Process Watcher #78742
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] Add warning code to all warnings produced in WasmAppBuilder #79234
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.3
  • Add code to create the different ILLink packages #79480
    needs-author-action, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Fix memory leaks reported by static analyzer #78492
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix versions of the .NET 8 ILC package #79497
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [JIT] X64 - Extend emitter peephole optimization of eliminating unnecessary `mov` instructions #79381
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for the Aho-Corasick algorithm in regexes. #71588
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Avoid caching compilation data and use value equality for SyntaxNodes #79051
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Adding the Vector512 and Vector512<T> types #76642
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-avx512
  • Make System.Reflection.Emit public types abstract #78544
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Optimize constrained calls made from gsharedvt methods. #79339
  • Remove mono specific SpanHelpers #79215
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • JIT: experiment with early liveness and use it for forward sub and last-use copy elision #79346
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimizing a series of divisions (#74020) #74314
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Initial JIT test merging #78259
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Introduce OptLevel() in jit #77465
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Subject src-gen serializer to full number-handling tests #78010
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] mount VFS archive instead of copying it to MEMFS #79506
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Remove RequiresDynamicCode from Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection #79425
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [mono][llvm] Added a null-check for 2-dim array access #79450
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Equalize committed space in free regions and move regions to global free list #77597
    area-GC-coreclr
  • JIT: Properly mark compilation as having throw helpers in debug codegen #79504
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • fix SslStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated with cached credentials #79128
    area-System.Net.Security
  • New ASCII APIs #75012
    area-System.Buffers, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Change RunningPublish property name to _IsPublishing #79483
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Update suppressions now that netframework facade has forwards #79465
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, needs-author-action
  • [API Implementation]: Deconstruct for DateTime, DateTimeOffset, DateOnly, and TimeOnly #79499
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime
  • Fix thread-safety issues with enumerating ResourceManager. #75054
    area-System.Resources, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: compiler crashes for some struct optimisations #2112

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge to last NativeAot commit #2111
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Exception handling: funclets #2109

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Unify call lowering and codegen; support inline throw helpers #2103

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • When building 3.1.424-SDK, I get an error #29495

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix garbage collection for aliased workload packs #29508
    Area-Workloads
  • Set server GC for F# FSC/FSI #29506
    Area-FSharp
  • createdinomagi #29496
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2065417 #29494
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Add base class for all test classes using WatchableApp. #29258
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Upgrade ApiCompat / GenAPI source build tfm to net8.0 #29497
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0.2xx] tab completion to suggest only first from short name synonyms #29235
    Area-dotnet new

Updated

  • Update target framework version in toolsetinfo for NET 8. #29316
  • Try not building the test assets and see what happens #29376
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add support for an explicit interface implementation methods #29471
    Area-GenAPI
  • Use linker matching TFM #29441
    Area-ILLink
  • Change .templateengine folder path #29449
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Proposal]: Add `private` and `namespace` accessibility modifiers for top-level types. #6794

PullRequests

Merged

  • Adjust invocation rules for ref return of ref struct type #6781
  • Typo fix #6789

Updated

  • Update primary-constructors.md #6790
  • Update params-span.md following LDM 2022-11-30 #6784

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • DocumentationCommentCompiler.GetDescription fails on net7.0 #65951
  • System.InvalidOperationException #65949
  • Capturing wrong variable in a local static function by using an extension method #65938
    17.5
  • IDE0072: Add missing cases to enum takes extremely long time for enums with many values. #65937
  • Error list UX/functional issue with LSP pull diagnostics enabled #65936
  • LSP pull diagnostics performance issues in squiggles + error list #65935
    17.5
  • `throw` in switch expressions doesn't parse properly #65934
  • VB Code gen optimization: Use `Array.Empty<T>()` for `Dim x(-1) As T` #65933
  • `AsInterfaceMember` should handle expression-bodied properly #65932
  • `AsPublicInterfaceImplementation` doesn't handle expression-bodied correctly. #65931

Closed

  • VS2022 Preview + Extension issues #65444
    17.5
  • Primary Constructors #65946
  • EndToEndTests.OverflowOnFluentCall fails on Debug_32 CI runs #65940
    17.5
  • Find references to symbol displays regex-formatted strings incorrectly #65926
  • FAR doesn't build the code correctly when there are multiple "nested" classifications #63702
  • Use separate columns in sqlite to store key-info. #65540
  • code generator sees wrong ISymbol when referencing shadowed nested types #65704
  • `ERR_AssgReadonlyStatic` only under `#nullable enable` #65428
    17.5
  • Editor doesn't render documentation comments properly #58966
    C# 12.0
  • `#nullable enable` adds a "not CLS-compliant" diagnostic #62368
    Backlog
  • Share synthesized delegate types with same default parameter values #65213
    C# 12.0
  • Upgrading Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp package from 4.0.1 to 4.1.0 broke build until SDK 6.0.2 and VS update #59687
    17.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Switch some code from HostWorkspaceServices to SolutionServices #65950
    Area-IDE
  • Use newer msbuild versions #65947
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Delete unused type #65945
    Area-IDE
  • run bootstrap build on linux #65942
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Avoid boxing in BoundDagTest.GetHashCode #65939
    Area-Compilers
  • Ban usage of public options in Roslyn #65930
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Avoid inlining ILanguageClientBroker initialization #65929
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Simplify how semantic-tokens works with text tokens #65944
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Semantic Snippets - else snippet #65178
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Pass cancellation token consistently through lsif generator. #65875
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main into features/SharedSyntaxTrees #65943
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove code for cloning compilations for skeleton references #65842
    Area-IDE
  • Skip OverflowOnFluentCall on 32bit debug CI runs #65941
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Fix embedded language classificatino in Find-Refs results. #65928
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/SharedSyntaxTrees #65927
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65902
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #65904
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix wrong symbol comparisons #65430
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Fix several issues with CreateSpan support #65919
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Allow optional and `params` parameters in synthesized delegate templates #65582
    Area-Compilers, Next

Updated

  • Add new API to easily tell if a node contains conditional directives (without allocations). #65794
    Area-Compilers
  • Bind and emit Primary Constructor #65899
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Add support for draft of semantic tokens LSIF spec to LSIF generator #65860
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Bump mac editor and implement CocoaTextBufferVisibilityTracker #65568
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Adjust calculation of invocation escape when return type is ref to ref struct #65857
    Area-Compilers
  • Update all linked files to have the same content object instances when updating the workspace's solution. #65885
    Area-IDE
  • Allow multiline override #65395
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Remove a bunch of compatibility shims for TypeScript #65897
    Area-IDE
  • Use ILegacyDocumentOptionsProvider if it is available #65614
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Remove the feature flag and change the default for open generated files #60976
    Area-IDE
  • reduce the amount of time that we switch from a background thread to … #65641
    Area-IDE
  • WIP: Share syntax trees across linked files. #65793
    Area-IDE
  • Move off of the final usage of an uncached AsyncLazy #65780
    Area-IDE
  • log data for analyzers/codefixes/refactorings #65158
    Area-IDE
  • Emit `DecimalConstantAttribute` for synthesized delegates #65777
    Area-Compilers
  • Adding support for the nullability of generic parameters of method parameters when using ExtractMethod #65925
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Simplify GlobalKeywordRecommender #65814
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Split out ref safety analysis into a separate pass after binding #64928
    Area-Compilers
  • Stop referencing packages that became inbox on modern .NET. #65810
    Area-Infrastructure, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • 404 with _content/Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.CustomElements/BlazorCustomElements.js #45558
  • Quarantine WriteAsJsonAsync_AsyncEnumerable_ClosedConnecton #45557
    Test failures
  • QuickGrid: Full support for localization #45556
    Backlog
  • Support for AuthN with JWT stored in session http-only cookies #45550
  • JSON polymorphic serialization does not add $type to single controller results #45548
  • Perf improvement: plainTextWithFilter #45546

Closed

  • ISingleClientProxy.InvokeAsync<T> throwing System.Exception upon receiving return value from client invocations using messagepack protocol #45168
  • Perf regression: mvc #45547
  • Is it possible to start an Blazor project with custom headers? #45533
  • I want to send a domain_hint from Blazor Web Assembly (using Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.MsalWebAssemblyServiceCollectionExtensions.AddMsalAuthentication ) #29440 #45468
  • SignalR Server side InvokeCoreAsync blocks connection when client is not processing result async #45503
  • net7 blazor AuthorizeRouteView.NotAuthorized can not get AuthenticationState #45543
  • Perf regression: plaintext #45539
  • Perf regression: json, json_nodejs #45545

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow injection of Gson or JsonParser (or both) when constructing JsonHubProtocol #45555
    area-signalr, community-contribution

Merged

  • [TS Client] Fix CompletionMessage result when passing false or null #45169
    area-signalr, signalr-client-javascript, 8.0-preview1
  • Improved rate limiting tests #45541
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Add note about updating an existing installation #45518
    8.0-preview1
  • Cover C++ installation issue in BuildErrors #45521
    8.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `1f643f7` to `516940f` #45551
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `b95684a` to `dbbe162` #45552
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Route tooling: Support component routes #44656
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Reimplement the default object pool for improved performance #45251
    Perf, area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix DictionaryModelBinder null reference issue #45515
    area-web-frameworks
  • Support STJ Polymorphism #45405
  • Remove obsolete classes #45466
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add compatibility suppression files to repo #45507
    area-infrastructure
  • Bump SDK to 8.0.100-alpha.1.22607.6 #44925
    area-infrastructure
  • ApiAuthorizationDbContext.cs missing ServerSideSessions Patch #45145
    area-identity, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-12
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Update tutorial scenario - App is experiencing intermittent exceptions #3550

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Parent view is visually covering the child view #12040
  • Memory leaks EVERYWHERE #12039
  • Unhandled Win32 Exception when Calling Shell.GoToAsync(..) during a load of a page #12038
  • Button/ImageButton Released event does not fire after multi-touch unless finger is on the button #12037
  • CollectionView ItemsUpdatingScrollMode="KeepLastItemInView" not working when IsGrouped="True" #12036
  • XAML Binding errors not being reported on Output OR XAML Binding Failure #12035
  • ImageButton Released event does not fire unless cursor is on the button, or after a multi-touch #12033
  • The alpha check for using OverFullScreen on a transparent modal is currently incorrect #12031
  • Unable to install Microsoft.Maui.Sdk.Msi.x64 during workload install dotnet 7.0.100 sdk #12030
  • [Android]Scrollbars Visibility property "Never" is not working properly in the ScrollView control #12028
  • [mac][iOS] content clip issue. #12022

Closed

  • [Webview] height 0 when we inspect with google chrome #4667
    .NET 7 Planning
  • WebView HTML5 Games not loading #8241
    Backlog
  • MauiImage resource as stream missing #12015
  • ScrollView doesn't resize when child scaled #11850
  • Assembly load error in Android app referencing another project referencing a DLL assembly #10154
  • error MSB4019: The imported project "C:\Program Files\dotnet\packs\Microsoft.iOS.Sdk\16.0.1478\tools\msbuild\iOS\Xamarin.iOS.VB.targets" was not found. #11997
  • ContentPage - IsBusy="True" throw Exception on Android #12025
  • SwipeItemView does not work #10065
    Backlog

    Backlog

Created

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JSON Column nullable #29838
  • Invalid mapping when changing column name of child entity #29837
  • Error with loading the Spatialite extension with v7 of sqlite provider #29833
  • Make SharedIdentityEntry visible in EntityEntry to make change tracking owned objects easier. #29830
  • Linq query is throwing exception "could not be translated. Either rewrite the query in a form that can be translated... #29829
  • First Query take 8 seconds even with Compiled models #29827

Closed

  • Generated Model Snapshot throws InvalidOperationException #29534
    7.0.x
  • Exceptions not thrown, only if running with debugger #29791
  • JSON: Allow weakly-typed mapping via Dictionary #29825
  • Nullreferencexception scaffolding foreign key without primary key (regression) #29828
  • Set MaxLength ToJson column #29823

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_e_sqlcipher from 2.1.2 to 2.1.3 #29836
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.core from 2.1.2 to 2.1.3 #29835
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.OData from 8.0.11 to 8.0.12 #29834
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • Allow underscores in identifiers again #29821
  • Include table name for overrides in snapshot. #29819
  • Undo all my debugging attempts. #29817

Updated

  • Avoid redundant looping in property metadata #29805
  • Fix to #29513 - Json: improve projection deduplication for scenarios containing collection indexers #29808
  • [release/7.0] Include table name for overrides in snapshot. #29820
    Servicing-consider
  • [release/7.0] Allow underscores in identifiers again #29822
  • Updating SQLitePCLRaw library versions to 2.1.3 as it has ppc64le sup… #29783
